statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={3.3}, \displaystyle{b}={6.7}, \displaystyle{c}={8.7}, and \displaystyle{d}={9.4} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={113}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
